achievements.name: Clean Drive
achievements.description: Obtained if the player completes 5 laps without getting any damage to the car. Any mode.

achievements.name: 10 Laps in hotlap mode
achievements.description: Obtained if the player completes 10 valid laps in Hotlap mode.

achievements.name: 10 Laps in practice mode
achievements.description: Obtained if the player completes 10 valid laps in Practice mode

achievements.name: Time Attack Rookie
achievements.description: Obtained if the player completes 3 laps in Time Attack Mode

achievements.name: Time Attack Driver
achievements.description: Obtained if the player completes 5 laps in Time Attack Mode.

achievements.name: Time Attack Master
achievements.description: Obtained if the player completes 10 laps in Time Attack Mode.

achievements.name: Sim practice
achievements.description: Obtained if the player completes 10 laps in practice mode with no assists. If the car has some assist by default, the player must turn them off.

achievements.name: Going for the distance (100)
achievements.description: Obtained if the player drive more than 100 Km in one session

achievements.name: Going for the distance (250)
achievements.description: Obtained if the player drive more than 250 Km in one session

achievements.name: Combo Rookie
achievements.description: Obtained if the player achieves 10 combos in drift mode

achievements.name: Combo Driver
achievements.description: Obtained if the player achieves 25 combos in drift mode

achievements.name: Combo Master
achievements.description: Obtained if the player achieves 50 combos in drift mode

achievements.name: Going for the distance (50)
achievements.description: Obtained if the player drive more than 50 Km in one session
